messages.subject: Our newspaper interview!
messages.msgSnippet: http://jdnews.com/SiteProcessor.cfm?Template=/GlobalTemplates/Details.cfm&StoryID=39549&Section=News Hopefully this link will work well. While it looks a
messages.messageBody:
http://jdnews.com/SiteProcessor.cfm?Template=/GlobalTemplates/Details.cfm&StoryID=39549&Section=News

Hopefully this link will work well. While it looks a little choppy in the editing, not quite clear in a couple areas, I think the reporter did an excellent job in sharing our unschooling with the local community. :-) I was a little nervous about doing this interview, but I think it went well.

I'll check out the paper itself tomorrow, and see if I can get it scanned so I can share any pictures.

There is one typo in that we are planning a trip to the NC Gourd musuem, not gourt (which we'd seen on Food Network's "Unwrapped" tv show). And later on the bit about the worms is chopped up into another paragraph so it doesn't sound quite right. Oh..and towards the bottom it should be that "It may seem to be chaotic around here"

She did quote Sarah exactly on the "It's fun and stretches my brain to new heights" quote about reading.

I had alot more to say about unschooling with Megan and how I see it benefitting her as well.

Other than that...really, I think it came out pretty well. :-)

Beth




Sing, Dance, Laugh...LOVE!
